    • Method Detail

      • getConfiguration

        @Get
public org.restlet.representation.Representation getConfiguration()
                                                           throws NotFoundException,
                                                                  ServerException
        Gets the configuration for the configured UMA provider for the realm.
        Returns:
        The UMA configuration.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - If no UMA provider has been configured for the realm.
        ServerException - If there is a problem retrieving the configuration for the store.
